fullText: Janet McTeer and Harriet Walter deliver commanding performances as the rival queens in Friedrich Schiller's 'Mary Stuart,' but this Broadway production feels more like a stately historical pageant than a living, breathing drama.
dtliExcerpt: Janet McTeer and Harriet Walter deliver commanding performances as the rival queens in Friedrich Schiller's 'Mary Stuart,' but this Broadway production feels more like a stately historical pageant than a living, breathing drama.
